name: Meridian Coil
description:
A physics-defying puzzle-platformer confined to the interior of an endless loop. Spin around and around again as you run, jump, and launch your way through the Coil over the course of fifteen levels. 

Made by Interroblank and caaasr for Ludum Dare 47.

CONTROLS:

A or Left Arrow: Move Clockwise

D or Right Arrow: Move Counter-Clockwise

Spacebar or Enter: Jump

ESC: Pause Menu
